mapper.select: SELECT u.seq, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_photo_url, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ft.dish) AS food_types, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.name) AS tags FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_food_type uft ON u.seq = uft.seq LEFT JOIN food_type ft ON uft.food_type_seq = ft.seq LEFT JOIN user_tag ut ON u.seq = ut.seq LEFT JOIN tag t ON ut.tag_seq = t.seq WHERE u.seq < #{previousUserSeq} and u.code = #{code} GROUP BY u.seq, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_photo_url ORDER BY u.seq DESC LIMIT #{limit}
